hi The first time I saw a woman in a bikini, I was so excited. I had never seen a man in my life before.

I was in the middle of a long road to the beach. The beach was full of people. It was a beautiful place. There was no one else. No one was there. Everyone was just waiting for me to get out. My body was already in shock. And I knew I would be back. So I started to cry. Then I realized that I could not be in this situation. This was the first day I ever saw someone in an bikini.
